With pristine, palm-fringed beaches and turquoise waters, it's no surprise this was the choice destination for the Dicaprio blockbuster. This full day island-hopping trip will first take you to the sparkling sands of Bamboo Island. A private crescent-shaped bay where you can relax on the beach or snorkel beautifully clear waters. Departing for Hin Klang, you'll be mesmerized by the colorful marine life and coral reef resting just feet below the surface, before heading to Phi Phi Don for a beachside restaurant lunch. A sightseeing cruise will take you past the islands' fascinating rock formations to where it's feeding time at Monkey Beach. The most fascinating part of the trip comes in the form of Phi Phi Lay. Here you'll find the Viking Cave, home to a thriving bird's nest soup industry and of course, Maya Bay, where you can explore the spectacular setting of ‘The Beach'.

Muay Thai boxing, an ancient martial art, is unlike traditional Western Boxing in many ways. You'll be amazed at the pace of the sport with men and women fighters using not just their fists, but also elbows, knees and feet to trick and beat their opponent. If you are already a fan of Muay Thai, looking for some evening entertainment or just want to get the complete experience when in Thailand – a real Muay Thai match should certainly be high on your itinerary.

INSTANTBook now and get your e-ticket instantly INSTANT  Book now and get your e-ticket instantly Embark on a small group walking tour through the old Sino-Portuguese town giving you a full insight into the Phuket of hundreds of years ago Start the day visiting a local fresh market Visit Chinpracha House and Thai Hua museum Stroll through the old town visiting the old post office and first hotel in Phuket Hotel pick up and lunch are included Start the day visiting a local fresh market Start the day visiting a local fresh market Visit Chinpracha House and Thai Hua museum Visit Chinpracha House and Thai Hua museum Stroll through the old town visiting the old post office and first hotel in Phuket Stroll through the old town visiting the old post office and first hotel in Phuket Hotel pick up and lunch are included Hotel pick up and lunch are included What We Love:   What We Love: Thought Phuket was just a resort town? In fact Phuket has been home to a major trading port and tin mining industry dating back to the 19th century that brought thousands of Chinese migrants to Phuket's shores . With these flourishing industries came infrastructure that still stands today. Now a quaint town this tour brings the past back to life with all the stories and facts about what used to be. Start the day with a visit to the fresh market before heading to Chinpracha House and Thai Hua museum. Stroll through the old town famous for it's Sino-Portuguese architecture, those feeling peckish can try out some Hokkien style noodles and Malay tea which still remain popular from the days of the Chinese migrants.

INSTANTBook now and get your e-ticket instantly INSTANT  Book now and get your e-ticket instantly Show gravity who's boss with a bungy jump in the safest surroundings overlooking spectacular views Take the leap from the only fully licensed Bungee Jump in Phuket Feel safe with a managing team from the home of bungee, New Zealand, and over 20 years of operation on this site Enjoy the views over the Kathu woodlands above a lagoon You will receive a free t-shirt and certificate, as well as have the opportunity to purchase photos and a video Take the leap from the only fully licensed Bungee Jump in Phuket Take the leap from the only fully licensed Bungee Jump in Phuket Feel safe with a managing team from the home of bungee, New Zealand, and over 20 years of operation on this site Feel safe with a managing team from the home of bungee, New Zealand, and over 20 years of operation on this site Enjoy the views over the Kathu woodlands above a lagoon Enjoy the views over the Kathu woodlands above a lagoon You will receive a free t-shirt and certificate, as well as have the opportunity to purchase photos and a video You will receive a free t-shirt and certificate, as well as have the opportunity to purchase photos and a video What We Love:   What We Love: Go on – crank up the adrenalin whilst in Phuket! Take the leap from 50 meters above a beautiful green-blue jungle lagoon with panoramic views all round. Safety is paramount at the New Zealand operated and managed site, the only fully licensed bungee jump in Phuket since opening in 1992. You'll be driven to the pond-side site where you'll be fully briefed and prepped (now's the time to tell the team if you want to be dunked in the water on your jump!) Ascend to the top of the tower by lift from where you'll make your leap of faith – with a nudge from the crew if you like – and free-fall vertically downwards! Afterwards you'll receive a certificate and t-shirt with the choice to purchase additional souvenirs commemorating your initiation into the 50-meter club!

With a license, descend to depths of up to 30 meters amongst colourful coral on a slope dive or for beginners, take your first dip into the world of scuba in Raya's beautifully clear waters Make 2 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Complete beginners will receive instruction and guidance allowing them to scuba dive in shallower waters Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Transfers from your hotel and back are included Make 2 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites Make 2 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Complete beginners will receive instruction and guidance allowing them to scuba dive in shallower waters Complete beginners will receive instruction and guidance allowing them to scuba dive in shallower waters Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Transfers from your hotel and back are included Transfers from your hotel and back are included What We Love:   What We Love: As one of the furthest islands off Phuket's southern coast, you'll find Raya Yai to be delightfully uncrowded and unspoilt. Boasting mile upon mile of white sandy beaches and world class diving in beautifully clear waters, just a one hour boat ride from Phuket. A typical dive here is a gentle drift along a sloping rock face, sprinkled with a variety of coral forests. Large schools of false barracuda, octopi and cuttlefish can often be spotted, as well as other more common tropical species and Manta Rays. Dives at Raya Yai are calm and easy with depths ranging from 2 meters through to 30+ meters making it perfect for those wanting a relaxing dive and first timers too. The team of highly experienced staff at South Siam have an excellent reputation for safety and instruction. This will be a sure contender for best dive experience, whether you're a proficient diver or complete novice.

You'll soar high above the ‘Pearl of the South', enjoying spectacular aerial views of Phuket's famous beaches and most exclusive hotels and villas. Look on in awe at the incredible expanses of turquoise blue waters, emerald bays and secret lagoons combined with temples, a famous golf course, the big Buddha statue and lush mountainous terrain. Along the way, your highly experienced pilot will narrate the journey and point out interesting sights. The EC-130 helicopter is world renowned as the best tour helicopter due to a quiet engine and large windows allowing you a peaceful journey with panoramic views. So get your camera at the ready – these are some holiday snaps you won't want to miss.

Don't let your full schedule stand in the way of your relaxation — after all, you are here on vacation. Let yourself unwind with a series of special spa treatments in Orientala Spa. Go in for a mild Soother including a 50 minute Thai massage or shoo bad thoughts away with Varee Indian head massage. Pita clay wrap will warm you up and detoxify your body while Herbal Vayo Massage will let your experience the healing effects of a hot herbal compress.

Relax in boating bliss as you sail to a tropical island paradise, enjoying water activities from a luxury yacht Experience the exclusive comfort of yachting to Raya or Maiton Islands Enjoy activities in the uncrowded, coral-filled waters surrounding the boat such as swimming, snorkeling and fishing Tuck in to a sumptuous BBQ lunch onboard Enjoy the convenience of complimentary hotel transfers Experience the exclusive comfort of yachting to Raya or Maiton Islands Experience the exclusive comfort of yachting to Raya or Maiton Islands Enjoy activities in the uncrowded, coral-filled waters surrounding the boat such as swimming, snorkeling and fishing Enjoy activities in the uncrowded, coral-filled waters surrounding the boat such as swimming, snorkeling and fishing Tuck in to a sumptuous BBQ lunch onboard Tuck in to a sumptuous BBQ lunch onboard Enjoy the convenience of complimentary hotel transfers Enjoy the convenience of complimentary hotel transfers What We Love:   What We Love: Glide through tropical Thai waters aboard a luxury sailing yacht. Departing from Phuket, you can recline and sunbath on deck before arriving at Maiton or Raya Island (season dependent) a few kilometers south. Drawing fewer crowds, these islands are renowned for their spectacularly blue waters, romantic beaches and incredible aquatic life. Spend the day sightseeing, snorkeling, fishing and swimming from the back of the yacht before a BBQ buffet lunch is served on board. What more relaxing way to visit the islands!

INSTANTBook now and get your e-ticket instantly INSTANT  Book now and get your e-ticket instantly Spend the day surrounded by the beauty of Coral and Raya Island on a private speedboat charter - an exclusive and convenient day trip from Phuket Enjoy an exclusive private day charter to Coral or Raya Island on a luxury cruiser for up to 20 people Avoid the tourist crowds in your own double engine speedboat with 2 crew on hand Get picked up and dropped off directly from your hotel within the Phuket island area Enjoy an exclusive private day charter to Coral or Raya Island on a luxury cruiser for up to 20 people Enjoy an exclusive private day charter to Coral or Raya Island on a luxury cruiser for up to 20 people Avoid the tourist crowds in your own double engine speedboat with 2 crew on hand Avoid the tourist crowds in your own double engine speedboat with 2 crew on hand Get picked up and dropped off directly from your hotel within the Phuket island area Get picked up and dropped off directly from your hotel within the Phuket island area What We Love:   What We Love: Thailand has endless beautiful islands to explore. The trouble is, when you find one that's easy to get to, so have the rest of Thailand's tourists, which might slightly ruin your Thai paradise. Coral and Raya Islands, both conveniently located to the south of Phuket and an easy day trip, are idyllic, less discovered destinations renowned for their world class snorkeling. Collect together your travel companions and head out for a day in paradise - on your very own private speedboat! This exclusive private day trip from Phuket includes hotel pick up and drop off, a two-engine speedboat with two crew and eight hours discovering the turquoise waters around Coral, Raya Yai and Raya Noi Islands.

Motor to remote Ko Dok Mai Island to enjoy a great variety of dives which more experienced divers will love: a wreck, a wall dive and a coral dive Make 3 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites, great for qualified divers Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Have a pre-dive briefing and quick refresher before you go in Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Transfers from your hotel and back are included Make 3 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites, great for qualified divers Make 3 dives at one of Thailand's premier sites, great for qualified divers Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Receive friendly and informative instruction from a professional diver Have a pre-dive briefing and quick refresher before you go in Have a pre-dive briefing and quick refresher before you go in Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Feel safe in this operator's years of experience, wealth of positive reviews and top quality equipment Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Enjoy a delicious lunch between your dives Transfers from your hotel and back are included Transfers from your hotel and back are included What We Love:   What We Love: Dive at three premier sites off the Phuket coast in one day. The King Cruiser is a car ferry wreck from 1997. She came to rest 32 meters down and now attracts huge schools of barracuda, travellies and snappers as well as scorpion fish and lionfish. The three pinnacles of Shark point are covered with hard and soft coral and known particularly for leopard sharks and nurse sharks. Ko Dok Mai (flower island) is a small lone island boasting excellent wall diving ranging from 20-30 meters as well as two caves. Rock oysters, giant clams, sea fans, sea horses, shrimp, nudibranch and schools of yellow tail barracuda can all be seen here. Dive with a team of highly experienced staff, all with an excellent reputation for safety and instruction - you're guaranteed to have a great day under the water!

Boasting over 12 different species from Thailand, America and other parts of the world, this is without doubt Thailand's most varied freshwater fishing park. With a choice of bread or chicken & shrimp bait, you'll be treated to catches like Alligator Gar, Redtail Catfish, Arapaima, Siamese Carp, Pacu, Barramundi, Walking Catfish, Spotted Featherback and many more! Break up your day of fishing with an onsite lunch of Thai and Western food. You're guaranteed a great day of fishing with anglers regularly catching fish up to 40kg, and if you're lucky, possibly something bigger!

This modern 39 ft cruiser provides day trips off Phuket's shores with impeccable service and experienced crew. Experience the thrill of sailing, the fun of tuna fishing along the way, and the joy of splashing into the Andaman's beautifully warm waters. Day trip to Koh Raya or Phuket's southern islands to experience pristine waters perfect for snorkeling or a beachside stroll under swaying coconut palms. DaVinci comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests for day trips with a skipper and 1-2 other crew. The boat is fully equipped including refrigerators and iceboxes and a delectable Thai buffet lunch is provided under the shade.

Sporting four locations in Phuket, Oasis Spa offers a truly personal experience, letting you choose between stunning ocean views, secret lagoon villas, Moroccan or traditional Thai décor. With a variety of luxurious treatments like Sabai Stone Massage, Hair Spa Package, foot reflexology, herbal compresses, mango body scrubs and more, you will have a wide range of experiences to choose from. Don't miss out on Ayurveda — East Indian warm oil massage renowned for its mind and body healing properties.

Complete your visit to Phuket with a professional cooking class, suitable for both seasoned chefs and novice cooks. Classes include a market visit or in depth explanation of Thai flavors before the hands-on cooking lesson, with all ingredients and equipment provided, before the best part - tasting your creations! Under the watchful eye of globally recognized Thai cuisine expert Nooror Somany-Steppe, you will quickly master some of Thailand's signature dishes. Afterwards, you'll have the know-how to host an exotic dinner party and wow your guests with your newly acquired master chef skills.

Dive into Thailand's signature zen culture with an enjoyable and stress-relieving massage at Orientala Spa in Phuket Stay rested and refreshed in the busy Phuket with a selection of relaxing spa treatments Take a break from your full sightseeing schedule and experience the best of Thai healing Choose from 5 packages, from a traditional Thai massage to a healing sports massage Stay rested and refreshed in the busy Phuket with a selection of relaxing spa treatments Take a break from your full sightseeing schedule and experience the best of Thai healing Choose from 5 packages, from a traditional Thai massage to a healing sports massage What We Love:   What We Love: Unwind in the aromatic and relaxing atmosphere of Orientala Spa with a selection of treatments designed to rejuvenate and beautify. Known across the world for their healing properties, Thai massages are an affordable luxury and an experience not to be missed on your trip to Phuket. Indulge yourself with 1 to 2 hour massage sessions, from a traditional Thai massage to an oil massage or even a sports massage. Each treatment comes with its own benefits and will be a great way to refresh and catch a break from your active vacation.

Pick from many massages and treatments at Phuket's Oasis Spa for a few hours of total indulgence Take a vacation from the beach and pamper yourself with a series of luxurious spa treatments at Oasis Spa, one of Phuket's most exclusive spas Indulge in a powerfully relaxing massage with stunning ocean views and partially outdoor treatment rooms Enrich your skin with hot oil aromatherapy treatment, explore the ancient tradition of foot reflexology or get a special glow with a facial With seven packages to choose from, you're sure to find your perfect treatment Take a vacation from the beach and pamper yourself with a series of luxurious spa treatments at Oasis Spa, one of Phuket's most exclusive spas Indulge in a powerfully relaxing massage with stunning ocean views and partially outdoor treatment rooms Enrich your skin with hot oil aromatherapy treatment, explore the ancient tradition of foot reflexology or get a special glow with a facial With seven packages to choose from, you're sure to find your perfect treatment What We Love:   What We Love: Give your skin a break from the sun and the beach and indulge in a day of head-to-toe pampering at Oasis Spa — where stunning views and experienced massage gurus will take you to a state of complete relaxation.
